name: Tony Llewellyn-Jones

roles_in_work.title: The Girl who met Simone de Beauvoir in Paris

biography: Tony Llewellyn-Jones is a British-born Australian actor. He was nominated for the 1976 AFI Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role for his role in Picnic at Hanging Rock.Born in London, England, Llewellyn-Jones lived in Singapore, Kuala Lumpur and Zimbabwe before moving to Australia in 1965. He is the son of Dr Derek Llewellyn-Jones and Elisabeth Kirkby. He has performed in films, such as Picnic at Hanging Rock, on TV, such as a long running role on G.P., and on stage, working with Melbourne Theatre Company, Sydney Theatre Company and Bell Shakespeare. Source: Wikidata; 01/08/2023
